doc.title: Wide Asleep
doc.plot: WIDE ASLEEP is the portrayal of a young woman who finds herself losing control of her own life... and dreams! What happens when the lines between dreams and reality start to blur? Alyssa Ridley (Corene McWilliams) is about to find out. Seeking the the help of psychologist (Gale van Cott), Alyssa attempts to unravel the secrets of her dark and myserious past, and in the process, discovers that her deepest fears have come back once again to haunt her. Pushed to the limit, she decides to fight back and regain control of her dreams, only to unveil a spine chilling secret that will keep you guessing until the very end!
